channel.title: Storify on Damien Saunders
channel.description: Recent content in Storify on Damien Saunders

item.title: App Design: Storify - too many windows
item.description: Have you tried Storify? Is it just a little too busy? a little too complicated to get started with? I’ve read some great stuff about how to use Storify to archive events (weddings for example). Using Storify you can collect all the tweets, Facebook messages, Flickr pictures into a ‘story’. Sounds good so far. But what if you’re creative and not a creative writer? What if you just don’t have enough going on in your life?
